title: Geological evaluation of black shale as a suitable Supplementary Cementitious Material (SCM) to optimize the use of clinker in cement production
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Samuel Nunoo, Theresa A. Owusu-Sasu, Prince O. Amponsah, Francis Achampong, Mahamuda Abu, Eric D. Forson, Edward K. Ackom, Remi Touvet, Peter Dickson, Larry P. Chegbeleh
